steps.title: Go to https://whoer.net/webproxy in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://whoer.net/webproxy in a web browser. If the hide.me proxy server above isn't accessible, try vpnbook , or whoer.net . You can also search for a proxy server using Google.

steps.title: Type the URL of the blocked website in the bar.
steps.content: Type the URL of the blocked website in the bar. Most proxy websites have the URL bar in the middle of the page.

steps.title: Select a server location.
steps.content: Select a server location. Most proxy websites will have a drop-down menu near the URL bar that lets you select a proxy location from the US, Europe, or elsewhere. Choose the location that is the closest to you. Some proxy servers allow you to select a random server location.

steps.title: Click Go.
steps.content: Click Go . Other proxy servers may say something like, "Visit anonymously", or "Surf", or something similar.
